title: RITO MATCHMAKING
body:
I think this is probably the 4th time it's happened this week. 
It'd be nice if you grouped unranked players and losing streak players together [seperately], 
I was on a nice winning streak, had my promo game, and only to find that my top laner is feeding because he's "tilted" from previous matches, then to check his history to see it's all losses.
I wouldn't be as mad if this was a troll. But unranked/losing streak players....riot mate. 
You're really screwing with me mate, guess i'll just have to shank ya and stop buying RP.

Riot...riot buddy, listen here riot mate. I've had enough of your shit alright? 

I've dropped 2 divisions and climbed back painfully to get this again? Nah mate, i'm coming straight to your offices. 
**see you soon. it's on**

Shower me with icons and honor capsules, then throw me under the bus with trash.
I'm just asking to rank up to 'lesser trash 5' without newbs,
